products.name: Lighter Clipper Metal Large Green Leaves, w/case
description: Clipper metal Leaves Green - green hemp leaves on a black background, there are options with a black or green top.
Clipper is a leader in the global lighter market and is a favorite with refillable lighter consumers for its iconic, iconic design and high quality.
Clipper lighters work well with pipes and have features such as a fixed adjustable flame, removable flint and childproof mechanism.

products.name: Belt HUF Domestic Military Poppy
description: The HUF Domestic Military Belt in Poppy Red features a durable webbed construction with all-over jacquard HUF Worldwide branding.
Inspired by heritage military design, the belt is secured with an anti-nickel finish buckle engraved with a ‘HUF Original Logo.’ 90s vibes.

products.name: Belt HUF Easy Scout Belt Black/Black
description: Webbed nylon military belt w/ reflective logo taping
Metal buckle with embossed logo and bottle opener
Embossed logo at metal end clip
